sentences: Meil oli oivane päev oiva sõprusega.
context: The Estonian adjective 'oivaline' means excellent, brilliant, wonderful, or marvelous. It is used to describe something of very high quality, skill, or intelligence. The word can be modified with Estonian case endings and has a comparative form 'oivam' (more excellent) and superlative form 'oivaim' (most excellent).
